changeSet.author: BinsonZoom
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `${table.prefix}ai_conversation_vote` ( `id` bigint(20) UNSIGNED NOT NULL COMMENT 'Primary key', `space_id` varchar(50) NOT NULL COMMENT 'Space ID', `ai_id` varchar(50) NOT NULL COMMENT 'AI ID', `training_id` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'Training ID', `conversation_id` varchar(50) NOT NULL COMMENT 'Conversation ID', `message_index` MEDIUMINT NOT NULL COMMENT 'Message index in the conversation.', `is_like` tinyint(1) UNSIGNED NOT NULL COMMENT 'Like(0:dislike,1:like)', `state` tinyint(1) UNSIGNED NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 COMMENT 'State of this vote(0:unprocessed,1:processed,2:ignored)', `comment` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'Additional commentary', `is_deleted` tinyint(1) UNSIGNED NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'Delete tag(0:No,1:Yes)', `created_by` bigint NOT NULL COMMENT 'Created user', `updated_by` bigint NOT NULL COMMENT 'Updated user', `created_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT 'Create Time', `updated_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT 'Update Time', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), index (`ai_id`), index (`conversation_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci COMMENT='Conversation vote';
